entries.label: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
Ministry Of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises
Ministry of Fisheries,Animal Husbandry and Dairying
Ministry Of New and Renewable Energy
Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
Ministry of Women and Child Development
Ministry Of Skill Development And Entrepreneurship
Ministry Of Personnel, Public Grievances And Pensions
Ministry Of Petroleum and Natural Gas
Comptroller And Auditor General Of India
Ministry Of Environment,forests and climate change
Ministry Of Consumer Affairs, Food And Public Distribution
Ministry Of Development Of North Eastern Region
Ministry Of Statistics and Programme Implementation
NITI Aayog (National Institution for Transforming India)

fields.schemeName: Scheme for Supply of Male Goat on Subsidy Basis
fields.briefDescription: "Male Goat Supply Scheme on Grant Basis" aims to improve the breed of indigenous/local goats throughout the state. Through this scheme, one male goat of an improved breed (Jamnapari, Barbari, or Sirohi Bakra) is provided to goat farmers of all categories on a grant basis.

fields.schemeName: Supply of Kadaknath Chicks on Subsidy
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Supply of Kadaknath Chicken on Grant" aims to improve the economic condition of beneficiaries through poultry farming and protect and promote the Kadaknath breed. Beneficiaries receive 40 chicks along with food grains, medicine, and transportation support for 28 days.

fields.schemeName: Mukhyamantri Vas Sthal Kray Sahayata Yojana
fields.briefDescription: This scheme provides financial assistance to landless beneficiaries for purchasing residential land, ensuring housing for the underprivileged in rural Bihar.

fields.schemeName: Vandan Matru Yojana
fields.briefDescription: This scheme is a Gujarat government initiative providing financial assistance to pregnant and lactating women from economically weaker sections to promote maternal and child health.

fields.schemeName: Assistance for Installation of Sprinkler / Drip Micro Irrigation Systems
fields.briefDescription: Through this scheme, the Marginal Farmers, Small farmers, Scheduled Caste/ Schedule Tribe Farmers, Women Farmers, Big Farmers and Institutions are provided with a subsidy on the total cost or ₹ 25,000/‐ per hectare whichever is less for the installation of Sprinkler / Drip Micro Irrigation Systems.

fields.schemeName: "Sugarcane Nursery Premium" Sub-Scheme of the "Crop Production Technology" Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The "Sugarcane Nursery Premium" Sub-Scheme of the "Crop Production Technology" Scheme is introduced by the Dept of Agriculture and Farmer's Welfare, UT of Puducherry. Through this scheme, the farmers are provided Nursery Premium for Raising Seed Material to Plant One Hectare of Sugarcane.

fields.schemeName: Mukhyamantri Apprenticeship Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to enhance the employability of Gujarat's youth through apprenticeship training, offering financial incentives to employers, and promoting skill development across various industries.

fields.schemeName: "Subsidy for Cultivation of Fodder Crops" Component of the "Crop Production Technology" Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The "Subsidy for Cultivation of Fodder Crops" scheme was introduced by the Department of Agriculture and Farmer's Welfare, Union Territory of Puducherry. Through this scheme, cash incentives are distributed to Farmers and Self Help Groups for undertaking fodder cultivation in the Puducherry region.

fields.schemeName: Chief Minister’s Comprehensive Health Insurance Scheme - Tamil Nadu
fields.briefDescription: Chief Minister Comprehensive Health Insurance Scheme launched on 23.07.2009 as kalaingar Kaappittu Thittam. Now the scheme from January 2022 to 2027 is implemented through United India Insurance Company.

fields.schemeName: Nirman Shramik Jeevan va Bhavishya Suraksha Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Nirman Shramik Jeevan va Bhavishya Suraksha Yojana" aims to provide financial security and social protection through insurance and pension benefits to registered construction workers and their families. Benefits under various flagship schemes are provided.

fields.schemeName: Mukhmantri Sehat Bima Yojana
fields.briefDescription: "AYUSHMAN BHARAT PM-JAY MUKH MANTRI SEHAT BIMA YOJNA” is a flagship State Health Insurance Program of the Government of Punjab.

fields.schemeName: Financial Assistance for Medical Treatment of Journalists
fields.briefDescription: The Tamil Development, Religious Endowments, and Information Department scheme was launched by the "Financial Assistance for Medical Treatment of Journalists". The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to four journalists for medical treatment from the Chief Minister’s Public Relief Fund.

fields.schemeName: Aatmanirbhar Gujarat Scheme for assistance to MSMEs: Assistance in Rent to MSEs
fields.briefDescription: The "Aatmanirbhar Gujarat Scheme for assistance to MSMEs" aims to empower the state's dynamic MSME sector, which significantly contributes to employment, GDP, and exports.

fields.schemeName: Haryana Merit Cum Means Scheme For Minority
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Merit Cum Means Based Scholarship" by the Ministry of Minority Affairs, Government of India, provides financial assistance to meritorious students from minority communities in Haryana for pursuing professional and technical courses.

fields.schemeName: Aatmanirbhar Gujarat Scheme for Assistance to Mega Industries: EPF Reimbursement
fields.briefDescription: The "Aatmanirbhar Gujarat Scheme for Assistance to Mega Industries" aims to strengthen the overall industrial ecosystem in the State and also enable a larger set of manufacturing companies to emulate the adoption of clean energy and make them future-ready to compete in global markets.

fields.schemeName: Aatmanirbhar Gujarat Scheme for assistance to MSMEs: Assistance for Raising Capital through SME Exchange
fields.briefDescription: The "Aatmanirbhar Gujarat Scheme for assistance to MSMEs" aims to empower the state's dynamic MSME sector, which significantly contributes to employment, GDP, and exports.

fields.schemeName: Civil Service Incentive (De-Notified, Nomadic and Semi-nomadic communities )
fields.briefDescription: The "Civil Service Incentive" by the Department of De-notified, Nomadic, and Semi-Nomadic Welfare, Government of Madhya Pradesh, offers an incentive of ₹20,000 to ₹50,000 for successful candidates from these communities in MPPSC and UPSC civil service exams.

fields.schemeName: Post Metric Scholarship (Denotified, Nomadic and Semi-Nomadic)
fields.briefDescription: The "Post-Metric Scholarship" scheme, implemented by the Department of Denotified, Nomadic, and Semi-Nomadic Welfare, Government of Madhya Pradesh, provides financial assistance to students from class 11 to college level, including medical, engineering, science other courses.

fields.schemeName: Interest Subvention Scheme For Housing Loan For Regular State Government Employee Under APUN GHAR
fields.briefDescription: Apun Ghar is a new home loan scheme for Assam Government employees as per announcement made in the Budget Speech,2016-2017 under which home loans will be provided to the State Government employees at subsidized interest rates.

fields.schemeName: Tuition Fee Reimbursement of Sainik/Public Schools
fields.briefDescription: The "Tuition Fee Reimbursement of Sainik/Public Schools" scheme by the Department of De-notified, Nomadic, and Semi-Nomadic Welfare, Government of Madhya Pradesh, reimburses tuition fees for eligible students enrolled in Sainik Schools or Institutions.

fields.schemeName: Integrated Horticultural Development Program Through Diversification of Agriculture
fields.briefDescription: Through this scheme, the farmers are provided subsidies through DBT mode for Organic Manures for Coconut Palms, Tools and Implements for Agricultural Purposes, Mud Pots or Cement Pots, Plant Protection Chemicals, Motor Pumpset for Irrigation Purposes, Biogas Unit, Planting Materials, etc.

fields.schemeName: Adivasi Sanskriti Evam Kala Kendra/Majhi Bhavan, Manki Munda Bhavan, Parha Bhavan, Pargana Bhavan, Dumkuria Bhavan Evam Gosade Nirman Tatha Majhi Than Shed Nirman Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The "Adivasi Sanskriti Evam Kala Kendra/Majhi Bhavan, Manki Munda Bhavan, Parha Bhavan, Pargana Bhavan, Dumkuria Bhavan Evam Gosade Nirman Tatha Majhi Than Shed Nirman Yojana" by the Welfare Department, Jharkhand, aims to preserve & develop tribal culture & traditions by providing essential cultural

fields.schemeName: Scheme for Assistance for Research & Development Activities: Assistance to R&D Institutions/ Laboratories set up by the State Government or by Government of India
fields.briefDescription: The "Scheme for Assistance for Research & Development Activities" under the Gujarat Industrial Policy promotes innovation by encouraging R&D among companies and institutions, fostering technological advancements to drive "Atmanirbhar Gujarat."

fields.schemeName: Mukhyamantri Abua Swasthya Suraksha Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The "Mukhyamantri Abua Swasthya Suraksha Yojana" by the Department of Health and Family Welfare, Govt. of Jharkhand aims to provide quality healthcare services to eligible families. Beneficiaries receive ₹15,00,000/- per family per year as health insurance coverage for advanced medical treatments.

fields.schemeName: Soil Resource Management and Inputs Quality Control
fields.briefDescription: Through the scheme “Soil Resource Management and Inputs Quality Control", the farmers can give their soil and water samples to the soil testing lab for analysis and recommendation at completely free of cost.

fields.schemeName: Sports Scholarship Jharkhand
fields.briefDescription: The "Sports Scholarship" scheme implemented by the Department of Welfare, Government of Jharkhand aims to boost sports participation among Scheduled Tribe students. It provides scholarships, incentives, and essential sports materials for eligible participants.

fields.schemeName: Distribution of Pulses
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Distribution of Pulses" by the Department of Food, Public Distribution, and Consumer Affairs, Government of Jharkhand, aims to ensure food security by providing pulses at affordable rates to eligible households under NFSA and JSFSS.

fields.schemeName: Pradhan Mantri Garib Kalyan Package : Insurance Scheme For Health Workers Fighting COVID-19
fields.briefDescription: The "Pradhan Mantri Garib Kalyan Package: Insurance Scheme for Health Workers Fighting COVID-19" by the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare, Government of India aims to offer financial protection to healthcare workers involved in COVID-19 duties.

fields.schemeName: Scheme For Campus Accommodation & Facilities Enhancing Social Experience
fields.briefDescription: "Scheme for Campus Accommodation & Facilities Enhancing Social Experience (CAFES)" was introduced by AICTE to provide financial assistance for construction of hostel to create a congenial study atmosphere free from the shackles of domestic shores so as to encourage students to purse their education.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Petroleum and Natural Gas
fields.schemeName: Pratyaksh Hanstantrit Labh / Direct Benefits Transfer For LPG
fields.briefDescription: PAHAL (DBTL) has been introduced to curb the diversion of subsidized LPG. Under the scheme, Consumers will pay the market price for the domestic cylinder and the subsidy will be transferred directly to their bank account

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
fields.schemeName: CIFE - Institutional Fellowship
fields.briefDescription: From the year 2010 onwards, the division is offering Masters and PhD in two disciplines namely Fish Nutrition and Feed Technology and Fish physiology and Biochemistry with an objective of moulding professionals with fundamental and advanced knowledge and expertise.

fields.schemeName: Payment of Ex-Gratia to the Families of Suicidal Weavers
fields.briefDescription: Launched on 1st June 2004, the scheme "Payment of Ex-Gratia to the Families of Suicidal Weavers" by the Dept. of Handlooms & Textiles, Govt. of Andhra Pradesh, provides ex-gratia of ₹ 1,50,000/- provided to the family / next of kin of the weavers who commit suicide due to weaving-related distress.

fields.schemeName: Scheme for Assistance for Research & Development Activities: Assistance to Industrial Association for Establishment of R&D Laboratories
fields.briefDescription: The "Scheme for Assistance for Research & Development Activities" under the Gujarat Industrial Policy promotes innovation by encouraging R&D among companies and institutions, fostering technological advancements to drive "Atmanirbhar Gujarat."

fields.schemeName: Scheme for Financial Assistance to Integrated Logistics Facilities: Interest Subsidy
fields.briefDescription: The "Scheme for Financial Assistance to Integrated Logistics Facilities" under the Gujarat Integrated Logistics and Logistics Park Policy, provides financial support to private developers for creating logistics facilities and parks with the necessary infrastructure and services.

fields.schemeName: Mukhya Mantri Seekho Kamao Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The Mukhya Mantri Seekho Kamao Yojana provides On-the-Job Training (OJT) to educated youth in registered industries and businesses. Annually, 1 lakh youth will benefit, with a stipend of up to ₹1 lakh funded by the state government.

fields.schemeName: Scheme of Assistance for Common Environment Infrastructure: Financial Assistance for Common Environmental Infrastructure Facilities
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Scheme of Assistance for Common Environment Infrastructure" under the Gujarat Industrial Policy aims to provide incentives for environmental compliance to ensure long-term economic and ecological balance.

fields.schemeName: Mukhyamantri Protsahan Yojana Jharkhand
fields.briefDescription: The "Mukhyamantri Protsahan Yojana" by the Labour, Employment, Training & Skill Development Department, Government of Jharkhand, provides financial assistance to unemployed candidates who have completed skill training programs aligned with NSQF.

fields.schemeName: Widow Pension Scheme (HPBOCWWB)
fields.briefDescription: The "Widow Pension Scheme" launched by HPBOCWWB is designed to support widows of registered beneficiaries. Through this initiative, the Board will disburse a monthly amount of ₹1,500/- to help widows manage their expenses and improve their quality of life.

fields.schemeName: Scheme for Wage Compensation to Handloom Weaver Families
fields.briefDescription: "Scheme for Wage Compensation to Handloom Weaver Families" by the Dept. of Handlooms & Textiles, Andhra Pradesh aims to provide wage compensation relief to handloom weaver families. A relief assistance of ₹4,000 per weaver family is provided to compensate for wage loss during the rainy season.

fields.schemeName: Scheme for assistance for Start Ups/ Innovation: Interest Subsidy
fields.briefDescription: The "Scheme for Assistance for Start Ups/ Innovation" under the Gujarat Industrial Policy, aims to drive economic growth by generating jobs, fostering competition, and introducing next-gen solutions.

fields.schemeName: Yashwantrao Chavan Mukta Vasahat Yojana for VJNTs
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Yashwantrao Chavan Mukta Vasahat Yojana for VJNTs," was launched by the Dept of Social Justice & Special Assistance, Govt of Maharashtra. Each VJNT family will receive a plot of land measuring 5 gunthas (approximately 500 square meters or about 5,382 square feet).

fields.schemeName: Fair Recreational Activity and Non-Competitive Involvement in Sports Urban Connect Scheme (F.R.A.N.C.I.S Urban Connect Scheme)
fields.briefDescription: "Fair Recreational Activity and Non-Competitive Involvement in Sports Urban Connect Scheme (F.R.A.N.C.I.S Urban Connect Scheme)" aims to provide safe play areas for healthy recreation and sports to urban communities. Assistance is provided to develop safe play areas in urban spaces.

fields.schemeName: Integrated Fisheries Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The "Integrated Fisheries Scheme" by the Fisheries Division, Government of Jharkhand, aims to promote fish-duck farming and increase fish farmers' income. The scheme provides financial assistance of up to 80% for eligible SC/ST/women beneficiaries and 70% for others.

fields.schemeName: Pandit Deen Dayal Upadhyay Samoohik Pashudhan Beema Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Pandit Deen Dayal Upadhyay Samoohik Pashudhan Beema Yojana" aims to provide socio-economic security to livestock farmers in the state by covering livestock under an insurance scheme. Financial protection against the risk of loss due to animal death is extended to livestock owners.

fields.schemeName: Grant-In-Aid to Voluntary Organizations Working In The Area of ​​Disabled Welfare
fields.briefDescription: "Grant-in-aid to Voluntary Organizations Working in the Area of Disabled Welfare" aims to support institutions working for the welfare of disabled individuals. Grants for free education, training, residential arrangements, and rehabilitation are provided to disabled immigrants.

fields.schemeName: Scheduled Caste Boys/Girls Housing Assistance Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Scheduled Caste Boys/Girls Housing Assistance Scheme" by the Tribal Welfare and Scheduled Caste (SC) Department, Government of Madhya Pradesh, provides financial support for residential facilities to Scheduled Caste students who are studying in colleges outside their native village/city.

fields.schemeName: Goa Traditional Bakers (Poders) Subsidy Scheme
fields.briefDescription: "Goa Traditional Bakers (Poders) Subsidy Scheme" aims to provide financial assistance to traditional bakers (poders) in Goa to ensure the protection and growth of this traditional occupation. Subsidies for the purchase of flour are provided to traditional bakers who produce essential Goan breads.

fields.schemeName: Kharmore Sonchidia Award Scheme
fields.briefDescription: In the scheme "Kharmore Sonchidia Award" by the Forest Department, Government of Madhya Pradesh, the farmers are rewarded with ₹5,000/- if a Kharmor bird is sighted in the private land of the farmer and ₹10,000/- if a Golden bird is sighted in the private land of the farmer.

fields.schemeName: Dr.Babasaheb Ambedkar Udyog Uday Yojana: Financial Support to MSMEs in ZED Certification
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Dr.Babasaheb Ambedkar Udyog Uday Yojana" aims to support SC/ST entrepreneurs and strengthen MSMEs, making them globally competitive.

fields.schemeName: Devnarayan Chhatra Cycle Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The scheme provides free bicycles to girl students studying in Class 9 in government schools of Rajasthan who belong to the Special Backward Classes or specific communities such as Banjara, Baldia, Labana-Gadiya Lohar, Gadolia, Gujar Gurjar, Raiko, Rebari (Debasi).

fields.schemeName: Ambedkar Fellowship Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The objective of this scheme is to provide financial assistance to meritorious students from the Scheduled Caste category for research at the Ph.D. level. The selected students receive a monthly fellowship grant to support their research in specific subjects.

fields.schemeName: Scheme for Relief and Rehabilitation of Women Acid Victims
fields.briefDescription: Under the scheme, the acid attack victim is entitled to receive 100% free medical treatment from government or government-approved hospitals. Additionally, an ad-hoc relief of ₹1.00 lakh is provided to the acid attack victim, which is later reimbursed by the Women and Child Development Department.

fields.schemeName: Scheme for Assistance to Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSME): Assistance for Quality Certification
fields.briefDescription: The "Scheme for Assistance to Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSME)" launched by the Industries and Mines Department aims to position Gujarat as a global business hub, promoting sustainable manufacturing, MSME growth, and export competitiveness.

fields.schemeName: Haryana Gaurav Samman Scheme for Padma Awardees
fields.briefDescription: The scheme seeks to honour the exceptional achievements of citizens of Haryana who have excelled in fields of sports, arts, literature, education, public affairs, social work, science, technology, medicine, industry and other domains of public life.

fields.schemeName: Dr.Babasaheb Ambedkar Udyog Uday Yojana: Assistance to MSME Manufacturing Sector Participation in the Exhibition (National and International)
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Dr.Babasaheb Ambedkar Udyog Uday Yojana" aims to support SC/ST entrepreneurs and strengthen MSMEs, making them globally competitive.

fields.schemeName: Financial Assistance to Widower and Unmarried Persons Scheme : For Unmarried
fields.briefDescription: The aim of the scheme is to provide Social Security to Unmarried Persons who are unable to sustain themselves from their own sources and are in need of financial assistance from the State.

fields.schemeName: Dr.Babasaheb Ambedkar Udyog Uday Yojana: Assistance to Micro and Small Enterprises (MSE) of SC/ST for Plot Developed by GIDC
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Dr.Babasaheb Ambedkar Udyog Uday Yojana" aims to support SC/ST entrepreneurs and strengthen MSMEs, making them globally competitive.

fields.schemeName: Ambedkar DBT Voucher Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to support students from SC, ST, OBC, MBC, and EWS categories by providing financial aid for accommodation. The students receive ₹2,000/- per month for up to 10 months per academic year.

fields.schemeName: Transgender Utthan Kosh - College/Higher/Technical Educational Fees Refund for Transgender Students
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to promote higher and technical education among transgender individuals by providing financial assistance for their educational expenses. Under this scheme, transgender students receive a refund of their school, college, higher, or technical education fees.

fields.schemeName: Free Passport Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to facilitate higher education and global career opportunities for students by covering the cost of passport issuance. Under this scheme, final-year UG and PG students in government colleges receive reimbursement for passport application fees.

fields.schemeName: Scheme for Assistance to Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSME): Assistance in Implementation of Information and Communication Technology (ICT)
fields.briefDescription: The "Scheme for Assistance to Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSME)" launched by the Industries and Mines Department aims to position Gujarat as a global business hub, promoting sustainable manufacturing, MSME growth, and export competitiveness.

fields.schemeName: Transgender Utthan Kosh - Self Employment Programme for Transgender
fields.briefDescription: The scheme objective is to provide financial assistance to transgender individuals for self-employment/business establishment. Eligible beneficiaries can receive up to ₹50,000/- or 25% of the project cost.

fields.schemeName: Gujarat Textile Policy: Payroll Assistance (Fiscal Incentives to Labour Intensive Unit)
fields.briefDescription: The "Gujarat Textile Policy" introduced by the Industries and Mines Department aims to create a vibrant Textile Sector ecosystem and generate enormous employment opportunities in the State.

fields.schemeName: Vishesh Yogyajan Palanhar Yojana
fields.briefDescription: Under this scheme, children receive monthly financial support based on their age to ensure their well-being and education. To be eligible for assistance, the child must attend an Anganwadi/school between the ages of two to five years and study in school after the age of 6 years.

fields.schemeName: Gujarat Textile Policy: Assistance to SHG for Job Work
fields.briefDescription: The "Gujarat Textile Policy" introduced by the Industries and Mines Department aims to create a vibrant Textile Sector ecosystem and generate enormous employment opportunities in the State.

fields.schemeName: Interest Subsidy Scheme for Scheduled Caste/Scheduled Tribe Entrepreneurs
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to encourage SC/ST entrepreneurs to establish micro or small-scale service enterprises & to expand, diversify, or modernize their existing units. Under this scheme, a loan amount ranging from a min. of ₹20.00 lakhs to a max. of ₹1,000.00 lakhs is provided at an interest rate of 4%.

fields.schemeName: Dr.Babasaheb Ambedkar Udyog Uday Yojana: Assistance in Implementation of Information and Communication Technology (ICT)
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Dr.Babasaheb Ambedkar Udyog Uday Yojana" aims to support SC/ST entrepreneurs and strengthen MSMEs, making them globally competitive.

fields.schemeName: Market Development Assistance to MSMEs: Assistance to MSME Manufacturing Sector Participation in the Exhibition (National and International)
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Assistance to MSME Manufacturing Sector Participation in the Exhibition (National and International)" under the "Market Development Assistance to MSMEs" aims to offer reimbursement for stall rent, product literature, and display materials to MSMEs participating in exhibitions.

fields.schemeName: Shilp Guru Award
fields.briefDescription: The “Shilp Guru Award” for master craftspersons was introduced by the Ministry of Textiles to honor legendary master craftspersons of handicrafts whose work and dedication have contributed not only to the preservation but also to the promotion of the rich and diverse craft heritage of the country.

fields.schemeName: Incentive Scheme For The Electricity Consumers Under Various Categories In Andaman & Nicobar Islands
fields.briefDescription: "Incentive Scheme For The Electricity Consumers Under Various Categories In Andaman & Nicobar Islands" aims to reduce power consumption through demand side management and promote green energy adoption. The scheme offers monetary incentives to consumers who achieve at least 30% energy savings.

fields.schemeName: Market Development Assistance to MSMEs: Assistance to Organizers for Organizing Industrial Exhibitions in Gujarat
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Assistance to Organizers for Organizing Industrial Exhibitions in Gujarat" under the "Market Development Assistance to MSMEs" aims to provide financial assistance to organizers of industrial exhibitions in Gujarat.

fields.schemeName: Gujarat Textile Policy: Power Tariff Subsidy (Fiscal Incentives to Labour Intensive Unit)
fields.briefDescription: The "Gujarat Textile Policy" introduced by the Industries and Mines Department aims to create a vibrant Textile Sector ecosystem and generate enormous employment opportunities in the State.

fields.schemeName: Vahli Dikri Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The Vahli Dikri Yojana by the Government of Gujarat under the Women and Child Development Department . The scheme supports girl children by providing financial aid, free education, and insurance, encouraging higher education and reducing dropout rates.

fields.schemeName: Bhavantar Bharpai Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The scheme is implemented by the Department of Horticulture, Government of Haryana, aims to protect horticultural farmers from market price fluctuations and compensate them if they receive low prices for their produce in the market.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
fields.schemeName: Mahila Samriddhi Yojana
fields.briefDescription: This is a micro-financing programme aiming towards the empowerment of women from underprivileged backgrounds or economically backward areas. Through this scheme, these women can apply for a loan at a nominal interest rate to fulfil their dreams and goals and gain financial independence.

fields.schemeName: Union Territory of Lakshadweep Pension Scheme for Specially Abled Persons
fields.briefDescription: ​The scheme aims to provide a monthly financial assistance of ₹1,500 to persons with disabilities, including those who are deaf, mute, blind, intellectually disabled, or orthopedically impaired, with a disability level of 40% or more and without any source of income.

fields.schemeName: Jiyo Parsi Scheme – Medical Assistance
fields.briefDescription: This scheme provides financial support to the Parsi couples for fertility treatments, including Assisted Reproductive Technologies (ART) such as In-Vitro Fertilization (IVF) and Intra Cytoplasmic Sperm Injection (ICSI), along with other methods, including surrogacy, wherever required.

fields.schemeName: Jiyo Parsi Scheme – Health of the Community
fields.briefDescription: This scheme provides financial assistance to eligible Parsi couples to support their dependent elderly family members & children. The benefit is given only to couples who have a child after introduction of this component in 2017-18 & have an annual family income of less than ₹15 lakh from all source

fields.schemeName: Pashudhan Mitra Scheme
fields.briefDescription: Launched on 20th June 2013, the scheme "Pashudhan Mitra Scheme1" by the Animal Husbandry Department, Govt of Chhattisgarh, aims to expand veterinary and breeding services, strengthen service delivery, and provide incentive honorariums to Pashudhan Mitras for livelihood support.

fields.schemeName: Training Assistance for Competitive Examinations
fields.briefDescription: The "Training Assistance for Competitive Examinations" scheme provides financial assistance to non-reserved category students who are undergoing training in recognized institutions for competitive recruitment examinations.

fields.schemeName: Food Bill Assistance
fields.briefDescription: The "Food Bill Assistance" scheme provides financial support to non-reserved category students pursuing graduate-level medical, dental, technical, and para-medical courses.

fields.schemeName: Rajiv Gandhi National Fellowship For Scheduled Caste Candidates
fields.briefDescription: The Rajiv Gandhi National Fellowship (RGNF) Scheme for Scheduled Caste is formulated and funded by the Ministry of Social Justice &Empowerment. The scheme is open to candidates who belong to Scheduled Caste and are pursuing higher studies such as regular and full-time M.Phil.and Ph.D.degrees.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
fields.schemeName: ICAR Emeritus Scientist
fields.briefDescription: The ICAR Emeritus Scientist Scheme is a structural method of tapping the Brain and skill bank of the outstanding superannuated professionals of NARS by allowing them to complete the work in hand for its fruitful conclusion, and utilize their talent in teaching specialized courses.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
fields.schemeName: Top Class Education For Scheduled Caste Students
fields.briefDescription: A scholarship scheme by Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment for Scheduled Caste students pursuing studies beyond class 12th admitted in a full-time course in one of the notified institutions. The total annual family income from all sources must be less than or equal to Rs. 8.00 lakh.

fields.schemeName: RMEWF-Financial Assistance To 100% Disabled Child Of Ex-Servicemen
fields.briefDescription: A scheme to provide financial assistance to Ex-Servicemen or their widows for their 100% disabled child.

fields.schemeName: RMEWF-Financial Assistance For Vocational Training Of Widows Of Ex-Servicemen
fields.briefDescription: A scheme to provide financial assistance to a widow of Ex-Servicemen to settle in life through vocational training.

fields.schemeName: Emeritus Fellowship
fields.briefDescription: A fellowship scheme by University Grants Commission to provide an opportunity to superannuated teachers to pursue active research in their respective field of specialization in Indian Universities/Colleges/ Institutions.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises
fields.schemeName: Coir Vikas Yojana-Skill Upgradation and Mahila Coir Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Skill Upgradation and Mahila Coir Yojana” is a component of “Coir Vikas Yojana” and the scheme was launched by the Ministry of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Government of India.

fields.schemeName: Women Scientist Scheme-C
fields.briefDescription: A scheme by MoST for female candidates with a break in their career interested in addressing societal challenges through viable S&T interventions. 1-year training is provided in Intellectual Property Rights (IPRs), patent search, know-how, drafting, filing, trademarks, trade secrets, and copyright.

fields.schemeName: Financial Assistance as Shagun in Marriage of Man Workers or Son of Workers - Haryana Labour Welfare Board
fields.briefDescription: This scheme was started by the Haryana Labour Welfare Board (HLWB), Labour Department, Government of Haryana on 15.01.2019. Under this scheme, financial assistance of ₹21,000/- will be provided as Shagun for the marriage of workers' sons and unmarried male workers themselves.

fields.schemeName: Mahila Samiriddhi Yojana for Minority Community
fields.briefDescription: The scheme is implemented by the Haryana Backward Classes & Economically Weaker Sections Kalyan Nigam. Under this scheme, loans up to ₹1,00,000/- per beneficiary are provided only to women entrepreneurs of the target group, either directly or through Self-Help Groups.

fields.schemeName: Marriage Assistance - Folk Artist
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Marriage Assistance" was launched by the Art and Culture Department, Government of Tamil Nadu. This scheme provides financial assistance for the marriage of registered folk artists, or their son or daughter. The assistance aims to support the cultural community by helping with marriage.

fields.schemeName: Pre Matric Scholarship For Minorities
fields.briefDescription: A scholarship scheme by Ministry of Minority Affairs for students from minority communities studying in Class 1st to Class 10th in India in a government or private school, including such residential Government institutes and eligible private institutes selected and notified in a transparent manner.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
fields.schemeName: Construction of Hostels for OBC Boys and Girls
fields.briefDescription: The Scheme aims at providing hostel facilities to students belonging to socially and educationally backward classes, especially from rural areas, to enable them to pursue secondary and higher education.

fields.schemeName: Scheme to Provide Assistance for Setting Up Farmer Support Centers in State Market Committees and for Computerization of All Market Committees
fields.briefDescription: This scheme has been introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department, Gujarat. It aims to establish farmer support centers at market committee levels and computerize all market committees in Gujarat.

fields.schemeName: Package for strengthening to sugar co-operatives as may be policy decided by the State Government
fields.briefDescription: This scheme has been introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department, Gujarat. It aims to support sugar co-operatives by providing financial assistance for modernization, diversification, organic fertilizer production to enhance sugarcane farming and the sugar industry.

fields.schemeName: Mukhyamantri Mahila Udyami Yojana
fields.briefDescription: This is a flagship scheme of the Bihar government aimed at promoting entrepreneurship and self-employment among the youth by providing financial assistance of up to ₹10,00,000/- for setting up businesses.

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS) For Cottage Industries: Financial Assistance To Cottage Industries
fields.briefDescription: “Financial Assistance To Cottage Industries'' under the “Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS)”, implemented by the Dept. of Industries, U.T. Administration Of DNH & DD, aims to provide financial assistance to Cottage Industries on the term loan taken through banks.

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS) for MSME Sector: Assistance For Quality Certification
fields.briefDescription: “Assistance of Interest Subsidy” under the “Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS)” for MSME sector, implemented by the Dept. of Industries, U.T. Administration Of DNH & DD,  aims to extend support to MSME to get quality certification to introduce quality products in competitive markets.

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS) for MSME Sector: Reimbursement Of Free On Board (FOB) Expenses
fields.briefDescription: “Reimbursement Of Free On Board (FOB) Expenses” under the “Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS)” for MSME sector, implemented by the Dept. of Industries, U.T. Administration Of DNH & DD, aims for boosting exports in the Food/ Marine Food Processing Sector.
